history.proof: intros x y z. unfold prod_plus. rewrite plus_assoc. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: Ring.

In environment U, V : AbelianGroup x, y, z : U * V Unable to unify "(plus (fst (plus (fst x) (fst y), plus (snd x) (snd y))) (fst z), plus (snd (plus (fst x) (fst y), plus (snd x) (snd y))) (snd z))" with "(plus (plus (fst x) (fst y)) (fst z), plus (snd x) (snd (plus (fst y) (fst z), plus (snd y) (snd z))))".

original: intros x y z. unfold prod_plus. rewrite Ring.ax4. rewrite Ring.ax5. rewrite Ring.ax4. rewrite Ring.ax4. rewrite plus_assoc. rewrite Ring.ax5. rewrite Ring.ax5. reflexivity.
